comment._content: Hola, soy el administrador de un grupo llamado Antiguas y nos encantaría agregar esto al grupo.

comment.author: 46882290@N00
comment._content: Precioso daguerrotipo. Gracias por compartirlo y me alegro mucho haberlo visto en Flikr! La imagen es una belleza.

comment.author: 26893022@N02
comment._content: Why do I get the feeling these girls were orphans?

comment.author: 34138784@N08
comment._content: It always makes me sad to see all these photos ....here, and in antique stores, labled, "unknown child, unknown woman, unknown man".  At one time they mattered enough to someone to be photographed.  Nope, not orphans.  I'v decided the two girls in this image are sisters  .....let's call them Mary and Elizabeth Perkins.  They had this photo made for their mother who wanted a photo of them to carry in her locket ....to always keep them close.

comment.author: 47160936@N02
comment._content: Beautifully put, Dear Dale. Thank you for your gentle comment.
